content.en: Distributed state estimation: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to improve the performance of distributed state estimation in sensor networks. These algorithms aim to enhance convergence, minimize estimation error, improve accuracy, achieve simultaneous input and state estimation, achieve estimation for nonlinear systems, achieve sparse signal estimation, improve robust filtering, and address challenges such as limited observability, unstable dynamics, time-varying transmission delays, and intermittent observations. The algorithms use techniques such as adaptive channel status estimation, robust Kalman filtering, consensus filtering, event-triggered filtering, unscented Kalman filtering, and weighted consensus to achieve distributed and optimal state estimation in sensor networks.
content.da: Distribueret tilstandsesimation: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer til at forbedre ydeevnen af distribueret tilstandsesimation i sensornetværk. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at forbedre konvergensen, minimere estimeringsfejl, forbedre nøjagtighed, opnå samtidig ind- og tilstandsesimation, opnå estimering for ikke-lineære systemer, opnå estimering af sparse signaler, forbedre robust filtrering og adressere udfordringer som begrænset observerbarhed, ustabile dynamikker, tidsvarierende transmissionsforsinkelser og intermitterende observationer. Algoritmerne bruger teknikker som adaptiv kanalstatusestimation, robust Kalman-filtrering, konsensusfiltrering, begivenhedsudløst filtrering, uscented Kalman-filtrering og vægtet konsensus til at opnå distribueret og optimal tilstandsesimation i sensornetværk.
